GisIoByteStreamReader Class Reference

#include <ByteStreamReader.h>

Inherits GisIoObjectStreamReader< GisByte >.

Inheritance diagram for GisIoByteStreamReader:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

GisIoObjectStreamReader is the template for all readers on GisIoStream. Readers for various sized objects or primitive types can be based on this class.

 Creates a Byte Stream reader. Reads binary data from a GisIoStream.
